short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Prompt Manager is a handy Chrome extension that helps you effortlessly organize and manage your AI prompts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing AI Prompt Manager, your new best friend for handling AI prompts! This super handy Chrome extension makes organizing and managing all your prompts a breeze. With AI Prompt Manager, you can:

Stay Organized: Keep your prompts neatly arranged in folders, so you always know where to find them.

Add Flexibility: Use variables in your prompts to make them more adaptable and reusable. Easily label final prompts vs WIP.

Versioning: Access all versions of a prompt at your fingertips. Easily revert to a previous version if needed, ensuring you always have the perfect prompt ready to go. 

One-Click Backup: Secure all your prompts with a single click â€“ no more worries about losing your work. All versions are exported as well.

Easy Sharing: Export individual prompts effortlessly to share with others.

Dark Mode: Give your eyes a break with our sleek dark mode option.

Ready to make prompt management simple and fun? Give AI Prompt Manager a try!

---
LAST UPDATE: Final version: Switch to material design due to problems on mac. Various bug fixes and optimizations.
